title: Error when training
body: Windows 10, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut2.2b8 Hi, I've been using deeplbacut with no issues in the past. However in the last round, I've not been able to initiate training. It produces an error where the 95Shuffle1.pickle file is not being detected. If I move the training folder to the DLC model folder, I can get passed this error, but then the kernel hangs with no iterations being displayed- GPU at 0% and CPU at 3%. Any help would be greatly appreciated! Thanks. (base) C:\Users\MaryTeenaJoy>activate DLC-GPU (DLC-GPU) C:\Users\MaryTeenaJoy>IPYTHON Python 3.7.9 (default, Aug 31 2020, 17:10:11) [MSC v.1916 64 bit (AMD64)] Type 'copyright', 'credits' or 'license' for more information IPython 7.18.1 -- An enhanced Interactive Python. Type '?' for help. Starting with multi-animal imaug + adam pose-dataset loader. --------------------------------------------------------------------------- FileNotFoundError Traceback (most recent call last) ~\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\gui\train_network.py in train_network(self, event) 327 displayiters=displayiters, 328 saveiters=saveiters, --> 329 maxiters=maxiters, 330 ) 331 ~\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\training.py in train_network(config, shuffle, trainingsetindex, max_snapshots_to_keep, displayiters, saveiters, maxiters, allow_growth, gputouse, autotune, keepdeconvweights, modelprefix) 191 192 except BaseException as e: --> 193 raise e 194 finally: 195 os.chdir(str(start_path)) ~\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\training.py in train_network(config, shuffle, trainingsetindex, max_snapshots_to_keep, displayiters, saveiters, maxiters, allow_growth, gputouse, autotune, keepdeconvweights, modelprefix) 174 max_to_keep=max_snapshots_to_keep, 175 keepdeconvweights=keepdeconvweights, --> 176 allow_growth=allow_growth, 177 ) # pass on path and file name for pose_cfg.yaml! Go through steps leading unto train network on the GUI 2. Click on train network 3. See error **Screenshots** If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
